action.action-desc: Ms. Mace introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2022 with respect to a civil action relating to the disclosure of intimate images.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Increased Accountability for Nonconsensual Pornography Act of 2025.

section.header: Civil action relating to disclosure of intimate images
section.text: Section 1309 of the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2022 (15 U.S.C. 6851) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (2), by inserting competent, after conscious,; and

clause.text: in clause (i), by striking or at the end;

subclause.text: in subclause (I), by striking the semicolon at the end and inserting ; or;
in subclause (II), by striking ; or and inserting a semicolon; and

clause.text: by adding at the end the following:
an identifiable individual engaging in sexually explicit conduct; and

paragraph.text: in subsection (b)(3)(A)(i), by striking $150,000 and inserting $500,000.
